arabicText: وَجَآءَ إِخْوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَعَرَفَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 Yusuf’s	 brothers	 came	 and	 presented	
themselves	 before	 him,	 so	 he	 recognised	
them	 whereas	 they	 remained	 unaware	 of	
him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yūsuf ke	bhāi	āaye	to	us	ke	pās	hāzir	huye	
to	Yousuf		ne	unheiñ	pehchān	liyā	aur	woh	us	
se	anjān	rahe

arabicText: وَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمْ قَالَ ٱئْتُونِى بِأَخٍۢ لَّكُم مِّنْ أَبِيكُمْ ۚ أَلَا تَرَوْنَ أَنِّىٓ أُوفِى ٱلْكَيْلَ وَأَنَا۠ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 he	 provided	 them	 with	 their	
provisions	he	said,	“Bring	your step-brother	to	me;	do	you	not	see	that	I	measure	in	full	and	that	I	am	
the	best	host?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	un	kā	sāmān	muhayyā	kar	diyā	kahā	
apnā	sautelā	bhāi	mere	pās	le	āao		kyā	nahiñ	
dekhte	ke	maiñ	poorā	māptā	huñ	aur	maiñ	sab	se	behtar	mehmān	nawāz	huñ

arabicText: فَإِن لَّمْ تَأْتُونِى بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيْلَ لَكُمْ عِندِى وَلَا تَقْرَبُونِ
englishTranslationText:
“And	if	you	do	not	bring	him	to	me,	there	shall	be	no	measure	(provisions)	for	you	with	me	and	
do	not	ever	come	near	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir agar	 usey	 	lekar	mere	 pās	 na	āao	 	 to	 tumhāre	liye	mere	 yahāñ	māp	 nahiñ	aur	mere	 pās	 na	
phataknā

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنْهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَـٰعِلُونَ
englishTranslationText: They	said,	“We	will	seek	him	from	his	father	- this	we	must	surely	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Bole	ham	is	ki	khwāhish	kareñ	ge	us	ke	bāp	se	aur	hameñ	yeh	zaroor	karnā
